_meta.title: Monthly Overview 이달의 운세
_meta.description: Strategic planning and week-by-week guidance for the month ahead

The Fool.month_overview: A month of new beginnings and fresh starts. Major new initiatives are favored. Take calculated risks.
The Fool.korean: 새로운 시작과 신선한 출발의 달. 주요 새로운 이니셔티브가 유리합니다.
The Fool.week1: Plant seeds for new ventures. The energy supports starting fresh.
The Fool.week2: Explore new possibilities. Don't limit yourself to the familiar.
The Fool.week3: Take a leap of faith on something you've been considering.
The Fool.week4: Review what new paths have opened. Adjust course as needed.
The Fool.best_days: New moon days and Wednesdays are especially favorable.
The Fool.challenges: Mid-month may bring uncertainty - trust the process.
The Fool.focus_areas: Innovation, travel, new projects, breaking patterns
The Fool.advice: This month favors brave beginnings. Don't wait for perfect conditions.

The Magician.month_overview: A month of manifestation and personal power. What you focus on will materialize. Use your skills actively.
The Magician.korean: 현현과 개인적인 힘의 달. 집중하는 것이 실현됩니다.
The Magician.week1: Set clear intentions for what you want to create this month.
The Magician.week2: Take action on your goals. Your efforts have extra power now.
The Magician.week3: Fine-tune your approach. Adjust what's not working.
The Magician.week4: Harvest the results of your focused effort.
The Magician.best_days: Sundays and days with strong energy feel most potent.
The Magician.challenges: Avoid scattered energy - focus on one major goal.
The Magician.focus_areas: Skill development, communication, starting businesses, personal branding
The Magician.advice: You have unusual power to manifest this month. Focus it wisely.

The High Priestess.month_overview: A month for intuition, inner work, and patience. Trust the timing. Hidden things will be revealed.
The High Priestess.korean: 직관, 내면 작업, 그리고 인내의 달. 타이밍을 신뢰하세요.
The High Priestess.week1: Begin the month with quiet reflection. Listen for guidance.
The High Priestess.week2: Pay attention to dreams and intuitive hits.
The High Priestess.week3: Hidden information may come to light. Stay receptive.
The High Priestess.week4: Act on the insights you've gathered throughout the month.
The High Priestess.best_days: Full moon and Monday bring strongest intuitive energy.
The High Priestess.challenges: Patience tested mid-month. Don't force clarity.
The High Priestess.advice: This month rewards patience and intuition over action.

The Empress.month_overview: A month of growth, abundance, and creativity. Nurture what matters. Projects flourish.
The Empress.korean: 성장, 풍요, 그리고 창의성의 달. 중요한 것을 육성하세요.
The Empress.week1: Plant seeds - literally or figuratively. Nurture new growth.
The Empress.week2: Creative projects flourish. Express yourself abundantly.
The Empress.week3: Mid-month brings harvest energy. Enjoy what's blooming.
The Empress.week4: Prepare for next cycle while enjoying current abundance.
The Empress.best_days: Fridays and days in nature are especially fertile.
The Empress.challenges: Don't overextend nurturing to the point of depletion.
The Empress.focus_areas: Creative projects, pregnancy/fertility, gardening, arts, comfort
The Empress.advice: This month supports organic growth. Nurture what you want to flourish.

The Emperor.month_overview: A month for structure, leadership, and building foundations. Take charge of important matters.
The Emperor.korean: 구조, 리더십, 그리고 기반 구축의 달. 중요한 문제를 책임지세요.
The Emperor.week1: Establish order. Create systems and structures.
The Emperor.week2: Lead projects and teams. Your authority is respected.
The Emperor.week3: Strengthen what you've built. Address weaknesses.
The Emperor.week4: Review the foundations you've laid. Plan for next month.
The Emperor.best_days: Tuesdays and business days favor leadership actions.
The Emperor.challenges: Balance authority with flexibility around week 2-3.
The Emperor.focus_areas: Business, leadership, structure, father figures, property
The Emperor.advice: Build lasting structures this month. Lead with wisdom.

The Hierophant.month_overview: A month for tradition, learning, and established systems. Seek guidance from experts.
The Hierophant.korean: 전통, 학습, 그리고 확립된 시스템의 달. 전문가의 지도를 구하세요.
The Hierophant.week1: Connect with mentors or teachers. Begin formal learning.
The Hierophant.week2: Follow established protocols. Work within systems.
The Hierophant.week3: Consider your values and traditions. What serves you?
The Hierophant.week4: Integrate what you've learned into practice.
The Hierophant.best_days: Thursdays favor spiritual and educational pursuits.
The Hierophant.challenges: Avoid blindly following rules. Question what doesn't serve.
The Hierophant.advice: Learn from tradition while finding your own path.

The Lovers.month_overview: A month of important choices and relationships. Decisions made now have lasting impact.
The Lovers.korean: 중요한 선택과 관계의 달. 지금 내리는 결정은 지속적인 영향을 미칩니다.
The Lovers.week1: Clarify your values. What do you truly want?
The Lovers.week2: Relationship matters come to focus. Deepen connections.
The Lovers.week3: Major choices may present themselves. Choose wisely.
The Lovers.week4: Live with your choices. Nurture what you've committed to.
The Lovers.challenges: Indecision peaks mid-month. Trust your heart.
The Lovers.focus_areas: Romance, partnerships, values alignment, major decisions
The Lovers.advice: Choose what aligns with your deepest truth.

The Chariot.month_overview: A month of drive, determination, and victory. Push toward goals. Overcome obstacles.
The Chariot.korean: 추진력, 결단력, 그리고 승리의 달. 목표를 향해 밀어붙이세요.
The Chariot.week1: Set ambitious goals. Point your chariot in a clear direction.
The Chariot.week2: Push hard. Obstacles can be overcome with willpower.
The Chariot.week3: Victory approaches. Don't let up now.
The Chariot.week4: Celebrate wins and plan your next campaign.
The Chariot.best_days: Tuesdays and high-energy days favor bold moves.
The Chariot.challenges: Don't sacrifice relationships for achievement around week 2.
The Chariot.advice: This month rewards focused determination. Go after what you want.

Strength.month_overview: A month requiring patience, inner strength, and gentle persistence. Calm conquers all.
Strength.korean: 인내, 내면의 힘, 그리고 부드러운 끈기를 필요로 하는 달.
Strength.week1: Establish a patient, steady approach to challenges.
Strength.week2: Tame difficult situations with gentleness, not force.
Strength.week3: Your patience is tested. Stay calm and confident.
Strength.week4: See the results of your patient approach.
Strength.best_days: Sundays and quiet moments favor inner strength.
Strength.challenges: Frustration may peak week 2-3. Don't give in to aggression.
Strength.focus_areas: Self-control, patience, working with difficult people/situations
Strength.advice: Gentle persistence wins this month. Don't force anything.

The Hermit.month_overview: A month for solitude, reflection, and inner wisdom. Step back to gain perspective.
The Hermit.korean: 고독, 성찰, 그리고 내면의 지혜를 위한 달. 관점을 얻기 위해 한 발짝 물러서세요.
The Hermit.week2: Seek wisdom through study, meditation, or introspection.
The Hermit.week3: Insights emerge from solitude. Trust your inner guide.
The Hermit.week4: Prepare to share what you've learned with others.
The Hermit.best_days: Late nights and early mornings favor contemplation.
The Hermit.challenges: Loneliness may arise mid-month. Balance solitude with connection.
The Hermit.advice: This month rewards going inward. Find your own light.

Wheel of Fortune.month_overview: A month of changes and turning points. Lucky breaks possible. Stay adaptable.
Wheel of Fortune.korean: 변화와 전환점의 달. 운 좋은 기회 가능. 적응력을 유지하세요.
Wheel of Fortune.week1: Changes begin. Be ready to adapt.
Wheel of Fortune.week2: Lucky opportunities may arise. Act quickly.
Wheel of Fortune.week3: The wheel turns again. Go with the flow.
Wheel of Fortune.week4: Stabilize after changes. Prepare for the new cycle.
Wheel of Fortune.best_days: Unexpected good fortune could come any day. Stay alert.
Wheel of Fortune.challenges: Unexpected changes may unsettle you around week 2.
Wheel of Fortune.advice: Fortune favors the flexible. Adapt to changes quickly.

Justice.month_overview: A month of balance, fairness, and consequences. Legal matters favor you if you've been fair.
Justice.korean: 균형, 공정함, 그리고 결과의 달. 공정했다면 법적 문제가 유리합니다.
Justice.week1: Review what needs balancing in your life.
Justice.week3: Consequences of past actions become clear.
Justice.week4: Achieve balance. Close out what's been pending.
Justice.best_days: Thursdays and legal/business days favor justice matters.
Justice.challenges: Face any imbalances honestly around week 2-3.
Justice.advice: This month balances the scales. Ensure you're on the right side.

The Hanged Man.month_overview: A month of pause, surrender, and new perspectives. Major actions should wait.
The Hanged Man.korean: 일시정지, 항복, 그리고 새로운 관점의 달. 주요 행동은 기다려야 합니다.
The Hanged Man.week1: Slow down. This month is not about action.
The Hanged Man.week2: Surrender to circumstances. See things differently.
The Hanged Man.week3: Insights come from stillness. Don't force progress.
The Hanged Man.week4: Prepare to act next month with new perspective.
The Hanged Man.best_days: Full moon brings insight. Any quiet day brings clarity.
The Hanged Man.challenges: Impatience peaks around week 2. Accept the pause.
The Hanged Man.focus_areas: Waiting, perspective shifts, spiritual growth, sacrifice
The Hanged Man.advice: This month asks you to pause. The view from stillness is clearer.

Death.month_overview: A month of endings and transformations. Let go of what's done. Make room for rebirth.
Death.korean: 종결과 변화의 달. 끝난 것을 놓아주세요. 재탄생을 위한 공간을 만드세요.
Death.week1: Identify what needs to end. Begin the release.
Death.week2: The transformation intensifies. Let go completely.
Death.week3: Clear the old. Make space for new life.
Death.week4: Signs of new beginning emerge from the endings.
Death.best_days: New moon favors endings. Any day of release is powerful.
Death.challenges: Grief or resistance may peak week 2-3. Allow it.
Death.advice: Let what needs to die, die. Rebirth follows every ending.

Temperance.month_overview: A month for balance, patience, and steady integration. Moderate all things.
Temperance.korean: 균형, 인내, 그리고 꾸준한 통합의 달. 모든 것을 절제하세요.
Temperance.week1: Establish balance in your schedule and life.
Temperance.week2: Blend different elements of your life harmoniously.
Temperance.week3: Practice patience. Good things come to those who wait.
Temperance.week4: Integration complete. Enjoy the harmony you've created.
Temperance.best_days: Any day of balance and moderation is favorable.
Temperance.challenges: Impatience or extremes may tempt you around week 2.
Temperance.advice: This month rewards moderation and patience in all things.

The Devil.month_overview: A month to face shadows and break chains. Confront what binds you.
The Devil.korean: 그림자를 직면하고 사슬을 끊는 달. 당신을 속박하는 것과 대면하세요.
The Devil.week2: Confront your shadows directly. Name your chains.
The Devil.week3: Begin breaking free from what enslaves you.
The Devil.week4: Experience greater freedom. Integrate the shadow.
The Devil.best_days: Any day of honest self-examination is powerful.
The Devil.challenges: Temptations strongest around week 2. Stay aware.
The Devil.focus_areas: Addictions, unhealthy patterns, shadow work, liberation
The Devil.advice: Face your chains this month. Freedom awaits on the other side.

The Tower.month_overview: A month of sudden changes and breakthroughs. Expect the unexpected. From chaos, clarity.
The Tower.korean: 갑작스러운 변화와 돌파구의 달. 예상치 못한 것을 예상하세요.
The Tower.week1: Prepare for possible disruption. Don't cling to structures.
The Tower.week2: Sudden changes or revelations may occur.
The Tower.week3: Clear the rubble. Assess what remains after the storm.
The Tower.week4: Begin rebuilding on more solid ground.
The Tower.best_days: Disruptions can come any day. Stay flexible.
The Tower.challenges: Shock and disruption likely around week 2-3.
The Tower.advice: What falls this month needed to fall. Rebuild authentically.

The Star.month_overview: A month of hope, healing, and inspiration. After difficulty, peace returns. Follow your dreams.
The Star.korean: 희망, 치유, 그리고 영감의 달. 어려움 후에 평화가 돌아옵니다.
The Star.week1: Healing begins. Renew hope and faith.
The Star.week3: Share your light with others. Generosity flows.
The Star.week4: Bask in renewed optimism. Set hopeful intentions.
The Star.best_days: Night sky viewing and Fridays enhance star energy.
The Star.challenges: Brief doubts may arise week 2. Keep faith.
The Star.advice: This month restores hope. Trust that you're guided.

The Moon.month_overview: A month of intuition, illusion, and the unconscious. Trust instincts. Things clarify slowly.
The Moon.korean: 직관, 환상, 그리고 무의식의 달. 본능을 신뢰하세요.
The Moon.week1: Enter the month with heightened intuition.
The Moon.week2: Navigate confusion with instinct, not logic.
The Moon.week4: Clarity returns. Act on what you've learned.
The Moon.best_days: Full moon night is extremely powerful. Mondays too.
The Moon.challenges: Confusion peaks around week 2. Wait for clarity.
The Moon.focus_areas: Dreams, intuition, psychic work, facing fears
The Moon.advice: Trust your instincts this month. The fog will clear.

The Sun.month_overview: A month of success, joy, and clarity. Everything shines. Celebrate and thrive.
The Sun.korean: 성공, 기쁨, 그리고 명확성의 달. 모든 것이 빛납니다.
The Sun.week1: Step into the light. Start projects with optimism.
The Sun.week2: Success flows naturally. Enjoy the warmth.
The Sun.week3: Share your success. Help others shine.
The Sun.best_days: Sundays and bright, sunny days amplify success.
The Sun.challenges: Don't let success make you complacent around week 3.
The Sun.advice: This is your month to shine. Don't hold back.

Judgement.month_overview: A month of awakening, evaluation, and answering calls. Major decisions and renewals.
Judgement.korean: 각성, 평가, 그리고 부름에 응답하는 달. 주요 결정과 갱신.
Judgement.week1: Evaluate where you are. Hear the call to rise.
Judgement.week2: Make important decisions you've been avoiding.
Judgement.week3: Answer your higher calling. Take action.
Judgement.week4: Experience renewal and rebirth from your choices.
Judgement.best_days: Any day of honest assessment and decisive action.
Judgement.challenges: Self-judgment may be harsh around week 2. Be fair.
Judgement.advice: This month calls you to rise. Answer with courage.

The World.month_overview: A month of completion, achievement, and integration. Cycles conclude successfully.
The World.korean: 완성, 성취, 그리고 통합의 달. 사이클이 성공적으로 끝납니다.
The World.week1: Complete unfinished business. Tie up loose ends.
The World.week2: Celebrate achievements. Recognize how far you've come.
The World.week4: Prepare for the next cycle while celebrating this one.
The World.best_days: Any day of completion and celebration is blessed.
The World.challenges: Reluctance to end a chapter may arise. Let go.
The World.advice: A beautiful cycle concludes. Celebrate before beginning anew.

monthly_structure.format: Week-by-week guidance with specific focus areas
monthly_structure.length: Comprehensive but scannable - 200-300 words per card
monthly_structure.focus: Strategic monthly planning with timing guidance
